title: 7.6 update this weekend and even worse frame drop
body: I have literally done everything in my power to have my frames return and have had no progress. I need help. I went and reinstalled, I lowered my settings, I changed ALL settings to max performance, including GeForce drivers, all drivers are updated. it started in 7.5, but honestly its bugging the hell out of me. I could usually have 150 on high like its nothing at ALL times. that was in 7.2 - 7.4 then now I'm lucky if I get 30 in fights and 90 while playing with no constant frames. what is going on with these patches that doesn't let it communicate with my drivers properly. help me

replies.body:
I had the same problem. I had over 200 fps then with an update it dropped to 100 fps with drops to lower then 10. So I start trying on other games like witcher 3 which where all running fine. Wrote a ticket which didn't help. Then it stopped after a small update. I still dont get the 200fps i had but i got a steady 90-100 fps which is great. Still don't understand what they changed though. My pc can better run bf1, doom and almost get more fps with witcher 3. Which is weird ofcource. 

Anyhow I hope they will fix it for you.

Hmmmmmm typically updating your graphics drivers are a good start to fix FPS issues. Since you've already been through and updated all of your drivers and messed with your settings, it seems like what's affecting your fps might be something very specific. 

Let's be sure to cover all our bases and check over the steps in our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) first. Hit me back and let me know how that helps!
I did all of those, It happened in 7.5 and has just gotten worse. I have basically reset everything. and installed all that can be installed.

Since it sounds like you've done a good deal of troubleshooting on your own end already, let's get you some more in-depth one on one help. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys will be able to help more!
